SCP 0.2.6.9001
  • Reference

Annotate single cells using similarity.

Source: R/SCP-cell_annotation.R
RunKNNPredict.Rd

Annotate single cells using similarity.

Usage

RunKNNPredict(
  srt_query,
  srt_ref = NULL,
  bulk_ref = NULL,
  query_group = NULL,
  ref_group = NULL,
  query_assay = NULL,
  ref_assay = NULL,
  query_reduction = NULL,
  ref_reduction = NULL,
  query_dims = ref_dims,
  ref_dims = 1:30,
  query_collapsing = !is.null(query_group),
  ref_collapsing = TRUE,
  return_full_distance_matrix = FALSE,
  features = NULL,
  features_type = c("HVF", "DE"),
  feature_source = "both",
  nfeatures = 2000,
  DEtest_param = list(max.cells.per.ident = 200, test.use = "wilcox"),
  DE_threshold = "p_val_adj < 0.05",
  nn_method = NULL,
  distance_metric = "cosine",
  k = 30,
  filter_lowfreq = 0,
  prefix = "knnpredict"
)

Arguments

srt_query

A seurat object.

bulk_ref

A cell atlas matrix, e.g., SCP::ref_scHCL

query_assay

assay used in the srt_query

DE_threshold

Threshold used to filter the DE features. Default is "p_val < 0.05". If using "roc" test, DE_threshold should be needs to be reassigned. e.g. "power > 0.5"

k

Number of predictions to return.

prefix

Examples

# Annotate cells using bulk RNA-seq data
data("pancreas_sub")
data("ref_scMCA")
pancreas_sub <- Standard_SCP(pancreas_sub)
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:06] Start Standard_SCP
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:06] Checking srtList... ...
#> Data 1/1 of the srtList is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data ...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 1/1 of the srtList...
#> Use the separate HVF from the existed HVF in srtList...
#> Number of available HVF: 2000
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:08] Finished checking.
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:08] Perform ScaleData on the data...
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:08] Perform linear dimension reduction (pca) on the data...
#> dims_estimate is 1:18 for 'pca'
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:10] Perform FindClusters (louvain) on the data...
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:10] Reorder clusters...
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:11] Perform nonlinear dimension reduction (umap) on the data...
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:24] Standard_SCP done
#> Elapsed time: 17.7 secs 
pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(srt_query = pancreas_sub, bulk_ref = ref_scMCA)
#> Use 535 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)


# Removal of low credible cell types from the predicted results
pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(srt_query = pancreas_sub, bulk_ref = ref_scMCA, filter_lowfreq = 30)
#> Use 535 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)


# Annotate clusters using bulk RNA-seq data
pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(srt_query = pancreas_sub, query_group = "SubCellType", bulk_ref = ref_scMCA)
#> Use 535 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)


# Annotate using single cell RNA-seq data
data("panc8_sub")
# Simply convert genes from human to mouse and preprocess the data
genenames <- make.unique(stringr::str_to_title(rownames(panc8_sub)))
panc8_sub <- RenameFeatures(panc8_sub, newnames = genenames)
#> Rename features for the assay: RNA
panc8_sub <- check_srtMerge(panc8_sub, batch = "tech")[["srtMerge"]]
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:33] Spliting srtMerge into srtList... ...
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:34] Checking srtList... ...
#> Data 1/5 of the srtList is normalized without log transformation. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 1/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 2/5 of the srtList is normalized without log transformation. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 2/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 3/5 of the srtList is normalized without log transformation. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 3/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 4/5 of the srtList is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data ...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 4/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 5/5 of the srtList is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(LogNormalize) on the data ...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 5/5 of the srtList...
#> Use the separate HVF from the existed HVF in srtList...
#> Number of available HVF: 2000
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:38] Finished checking.

pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(srt_query = pancreas_sub, srt_ref = panc8_sub, ref_group = "celltype")
#> Use the HVF to calculate distance metric.
#> Use 631 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)

ExpDimPlot(pancreas_sub, features = "knnpredict_simil")


pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(
  srt_query = pancreas_sub, srt_ref = panc8_sub,
  ref_group = "celltype", ref_collapsing = FALSE
)
#> Use the HVF to calculate distance metric.
#> Use 631 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)

ExpDimPlot(pancreas_sub, features = "knnpredict_prob")


pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(
  srt_query = pancreas_sub, srt_ref = panc8_sub,
  query_group = "SubCellType", ref_group = "celltype",
  query_collapsing = TRUE, ref_collapsing = TRUE
)
#> Use the HVF to calculate distance metric.
#> Use 631 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)

ExpDimPlot(pancreas_sub, features = "knnpredict_simil")


# Annotate with DE gene instead of HVF
pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(
  srt_query = pancreas_sub, srt_ref = panc8_sub,
  ref_group = "celltype",
  features_type = "DE", feature_source = "ref"
)
#> [2023-01-05 15:21:51] Start DEtest
#> Threads used: 1
#> Find all markers(wilcox) among groups...
#> 
  |                                                                                                                    
  |                                                                                                              |   0%
  |                                                                                                                    
  |==============================================================================================================| 100%
#> 
#> [2023-01-05 15:22:14] DEtest done
#> Elapsed time:22.59 secs
#> Use the DE features from AllMarkers_wilcox to calculate distance metric.
#> DE features number of the ref data: 2000
#> Use 1865 common features to calculate distance.
#> Detected query data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Detected reference data type: log_normalized_counts
#> Calculate similarity...
#> Use 'raw' method to find neighbors.
#> Predict cell type...
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, group.by = "knnpredict_classification", label = TRUE)

ExpDimPlot(pancreas_sub, features = "knnpredict_simil")


pancreas_sub <- RunKNNPredict(
  srt_query = pancreas_sub, srt_ref = panc8_sub,
  query_group = "SubCellType", ref_group = "celltype",
  features_type = "DE", feature_source = "both"
)
#> [2023-01-05 15:22:16] Start DEtest
#> Threads used: 1
